text: Tanage tanna odeyana vacanagala mulaka eccarisaladaga adannu kadeganisuva hagu tane sampadisiruva tanna karmagalannu maretu biduvataniginta dodda akrami yariddane? Avarige idu arthavagadante navu avara manas'sugala mele tereyannu elediruvevu. Avara kivigalannu kivudagisiruvevu. Nivu avarannu sanmargadedege estu karedaru avarendu sari dariyannu kanalararu
